PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12202010-09-30,  ,  CITIZENSHIP,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of AIMABLE NDEJURU of Montréal, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of twenty-one months or for a term expiring on the day prior to the coming into force of the Balance Refugee Reform Act, whichever is earlier, effective October 4, 2010.
